actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on November 4, 2025.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Chair announced the Speaker's designation of the period from Monday, November 3, 2025, through Sunday, November 9, 2025, as a "district work period".

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on October 30, 2025 at 4:37 p.m.: That the Senate passed S.J. Res. 77, S.J. Res. 80, S.J. Res. 81, and S.J. Res. 88.
Pursuant to section 451 of the Workforce, Innovation, and Opportunity Act (Public Law 113-128), the Democratic Leader appointed Ms. Sashca Bittner of San Francisco, California.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Adrian Smith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
